item.name: Load
item.description: LOADPCT: The actual load of UPS in %

item.name: Maximum battery runtime
item.description: MAXTIME : Max battery runtime (TIMEOUT) after which system is shutdown

item.name: Minimum battery charge
item.description: MBATTCHG: Min battery charge % (BCHARGE) required for system shutdown

item.name: Minimum battery runtime
item.description: MINTIMEL: Min battery runtime (MINUTES) required for system shutdown
